page.title: 10SCHOOLS
page.content: I am going to tell you about the school that I go to,it is called Alderman Newtons School after the man who started it.The school is 201 years old but the buildings we now use are only about 9 years old.There are about 1000 pupils attending the school aged from 11 to 18 years old.Most of the pupils live in Glenfield,New Parks or Park Rise. There is another school next door which is bigger than ours called New Parks School.The rest of the area consists of mostly houses but there are three churches and a swimming pool.The churches are (1)Church of England (2)Catholic (3)Methodist
